name: TETRIS®
description: TETRIS® needs no introduction. The famous block-slotting puzzler is renowned as one of the world’s greatest games; easy to pick up, yet impossible to put down! There are two main modes, A-Type and B-Type. A-Type is an endurance game that challenges you to rack up a huge score by clearing lines while the Tetriminos fall faster and faster. In B-Type you must clear 25 lines to win, but you can raise the stakes by increasing the falling speed of each Tetrimino and adding more obstacles within the Matrix. Do you have what it takes to win 'Level 9', 'High 5'?
